data.title: B Heaven Rafters Turret Setup
data.description: Use this powerful Killjoy turret in combination with your teammate's utility to contest for control of B Heaven.

data.title: Start Round Turret for B Main and B Heaven
data.description: An effective standard Killjoy setup that covers both B Main and B Heaven.

data.title: A Site Turret + Molly Combo for Defender
data.description: Here's a strong Killjoy setup that allows you to anchor on the A Site.

data.title: A Site Retake + A Heaven Control
data.description: Use this strong setup to prevent Attackers from rushing A Site successfully, while contesting for A Heaven Control.

data.title: Nanoswarm Setup For Under B Tower Zipline
data.description: This Nanoswarm setup is useful for breaking up the attacker's push into B Site from the B Tower Zipline, and potentially opening up opportunities to secure picks on players who have come down the B Tower Zipline.
